text: Oliver Eaton Williamson (September 27, 1932 - May 21, 2020) is an American economist. He was a professor at the University of California, Berkeley. He was a laureate of the 2009 Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences. Williamson died on May 21, 2020 in Oakland, California of pneumonia-related problems at the age of 87.Nobel laureate Oliver Williamson, pioneer of organizational economics, dies at 87 ==References== ==Other websites== * Oliver E. Williamson at University of California, Berkeley * Transaction Cost Economics: The Natural Progression, 2009 lecture at NobelPrize.org * Profile and Papers at Research Papers in Economics/RePEc Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:American economists Category:Scientists from Wisconsin Category:People from Superior, Wisconsin
title: Oliver E. Williamson
